title: Clear Film Clip License for a Documentary
description: A documentary filmmaker wants to use a 30-second clip from a classic movie. An agent must secure the license.

tasks.description: Identify the studio that owns the rights to the classic movie.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the rights holder.

tasks.description: Contact the studio's licensing department with the specific clip details and request a quote.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits a formal request for a clip license.

tasks.description: Negotiate the fee and execute the licensing agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes the agreement and secures the right to use the clip.
